channel.title: First Age - Your greatest adventure you never knew existed
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TRtidH1.png[/img] [U][url=http://first-age.com]First-Age.com[/url] [/U] [B]First Age is a server based off the Near Reality source, some may call it a "Near Reality Remake". If you liked Near Reality you will LOVE First Age.[/B] We are currently looking for [IMG]http://first-age.com/crown_moderator.png[/img]Server Moderators and [IMG]http://first-age.com/crown_serversupport.png[/img]Server Support. You will NOT get these ranks right away but we will be looking for some people to give them to!
[B]Links:[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xqd8CiJ.png[/img] Website - http://first-age.com [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6WjEvpH.png[/img] Webclient - http://first-age.com/misc.php?page=play [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6WjEvpH.png[/img] Downloadable Client - http://first-age.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=4[/CENTER]
[ul][*]Achievements [*]Nex & Nex Armours [*]PvP Armoury [*]Awesome starter kit [*]Great shops [*]Full website [*]Ganodermic beast (Gano) [*]Wilderness bounties with rewards [*]Revenanents [*]Everything Near Reality had [*]Fully working spirit shields [*]Strong and stable economy [*]God Wars [*]100% Up time [*]No lag [*]Friendly staff [*]Ganodermic Armours [*]Perfected Duel Arena [*]Custom Premium and Respected Premium Islands [*]Fully Working Skilling & Combat System [*]Fight Caves [*]Bloodlust (Coming soon) [*]Free for all minigame [*]Spirit Beast [*]Barrows [*]Custom Items (Lime/Lava Whips, Death Cape, Dragon Kite, Slayer Helm & PVP Armor) [*]AND MUCH, MUCH, MORE![/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/P275SAD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E6UXGoj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zZl74Px.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/36gj4Cg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZzuolWb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uTEqQG5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CszgTcr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AF9IGfD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1t5OGHN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4LxoYhv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qzpne8w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IbujSBN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MnZxjza.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lR8YZEW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/J9OrS3H.png[/img]
[B]More images:[/B] [spoiler][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RfZH9Kl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/00cEuDf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZNhCmRv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OiJIQqB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oidHGPN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qIXEfI2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f8fvjF8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MzcFwBd.png[/img] [/spoiler]

I guess all of us ‘never knew it existed’

item.title: First Age - Your greatest adventure you never knew existed
item.dc:creator: @First_Age First Age
item.description:
@First_Age wrote:

[CENTER]
[U]First-Age.com
[/U]
[B]First Age is a server based off the Near Reality source, some may call it a “Near Reality Remake”. If you liked Near Reality you will LOVE First Age.[/B]
We are currently looking for Server Moderators and Server Support. You will NOT get these ranks right away but we will be looking for some people to give them to!

[B]Links:[/B]
Website - http://first-age.com
Webclient - http://first-age.com/misc.php?page=play
Downloadable Client - http://first-age.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=4[/CENTER]

[ul][]Achievements
[]Nex & Nex Armours
[]PvP Armoury
[]Awesome starter kit
[]Great shops
[]Full website
[]Ganodermic beast (Gano)
[]Wilderness bounties with rewards
[]Revenanents
[]Everything Near Reality had
[]Fully working spirit shields
[]Strong and stable economy
[]God Wars
[]100% Up time
[]No lag
[]Friendly staff
[]Ganodermic Armours
[]Perfected Duel Arena
[]Custom Premium and Respected Premium Islands
[]Fully Working Skilling & Combat System
[]Fight Caves
[]Bloodlust (Coming soon)
[]Free for all minigame
[]Spirit Beast
[]Barrows
[]Custom Items (Lime/Lava Whips, Death Cape, Dragon Kite, Slayer Helm & PVP Armor)
[*]AND MUCH, MUCH, MORE![/ul]
